name: Rugby League Live 2
summary: Rugby League Live 2 is a sports game in the Rugby League series of Rugby League video games. It was developed by Big Ant Studios for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. It was released on 9 October 2012.[1] Commentary was provided by Andrew Voss and Phil Gould.[2] The cover features Benji Marshall, a former Wests Tigers player and now a St George Illawarra Dragons player.
